SELECT E.EMP_NO AS RE_NO, E.EMP_NAME AS RE_NAME, E.DEPT_NAME AS RE_DEPT, E.JOB_NAME AS RE_RANK, E.EMP_ADD AS RE_ADDRESS, E.EMP_ENROLLDATE AS RE_HIRE_DATE, E.EMP_RESIGNDATE AS RE_RESIGN_DATE, S.LONG_SERVICE_ALLOWANCE AS RE_LONG_SERVICE_ALLOWANCE, S.LONG_SERVICE_DAY AS RE_LONG_SERVICE_DAY, S.MEAL_EXPENSES AS RE_MEAL_EXPENSES, S.REGULAR_HOURLY_WAGE AS RE_REGULAR_HOURLY_WAGE, S.TRANSPORTATION_EXPENSES AS RE_TRANSPORTATION_EXPENSES, TRUNC((E.EMP_RESIGNDATE-E.EMP_ENROLLDATE)+1) AS RE_TOTAL_WORK, TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(E.EMP_RESIGNDATE,E.EMP_ENROLLDATE)) AS RE_TOTAL_MONTHS, TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(E.EMP_RESIGNDATE,E.EMP_ENROLLDATE)/12) AS RE_TOTAL_YEARS,
TRUNC((((P.BASIC_SALARY + P.OVERTIME_ALLOWANCE + P.HOLIDAY_ALLOWANCE + P.ANNUAL_LEAVE_ALLOWANCE + P.MEAL_EXPENSES + P.TRANSPORTATION_EXPENSES + P.BONUS + P.SPECIAL_ALLOWANCE) - (P.EMPLOYMENT_INSURANCE + P.HEALTH_INSURANCE + P.NATIONAL_PENSION + P.TAX + P.LOCAL_INCOME_TAX))*3)/90 )AS RE_ONE_AVR_PAY,
